Dialogue.Page: Forgotten Castaways is a story mod that takes place almost entirely in Dark Bramble, tasking the player with following the trail of the four Nomai that became stranded there.
Despite taking place in Dark Bramble, the mod attempts to make the location (somewhat) less intimidating, hoping to allow those who are not fond of the planet to play it.
(I’m also the one making Forgotten Castaways, so you can’t stop me from including it here!)
